name: Coconut Lemon Herb Chicken
description: It's creamy, delicious, and wholesome meal. Made with chicken, coconut, lemon, and herbs.

name: Spicy Thai Basil Chicken
description: A spicy and flavorful dish made with chicken, basil, and Thai spices.

name: Vegetarian Lasagna
description: A delicious lasagna made with layers of vegetables, cheese, and pasta.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Tasty beef tacos served with fresh salsa and guacamole.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Perfectly grilled salmon served with a side of vegetables.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: A classic Caesar salad topped with grilled chicken.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: A simple yet delicious pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.

name: Pad Thai
description: A popular Thai dish made with stir-fried noodles, shrimp, and peanuts.

name: Falafel Wrap
description: A wrap filled with crispy falafel, fresh vegetables, and tahini sauce.

name: BBQ Ribs
description: Tender and juicy ribs coated in a smoky BBQ sauce.
